containerDefinitions.name: prometheus
command: printf '%s\n' 'global:' '  scrape_interval: 15s' '  evaluation_interval: 15s' '' 'scrape_configs:' '  - job_name: sentiwiki-rag-api' '    static_configs:' '      - targets:' '          - api.esa-iagen.local:8000' '    metrics_path: /metrics' '    scrape_interval: 5s' > /tmp/prometheus.yml && cat /tmp/prometheus.yml && /bin/prometheus --config.file=/tmp/prometheus.yml --storage.tsdb.path=/prometheus --storage.tsdb.retention.time=30d
